title: Add Lodestar to Eth Consensus (eth2) clients
body:
Lodestar is ready to be listed on Launchpad as the 5th Ethereum Consensus client!

**Currently listed:**
![Screenshot from 2021-09-28 14-29-02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58080811/135163840-370b0f39-ab5a-476a-aed4-44069a89d8ae.png)
![Screenshot from 2021-09-28 14-29-40](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58080811/135163856-d532b0fb-9705-4635-a8cf-dca245e87915.png)



**Implementation request:** 

![lodestar](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58080811/135161585-95e90e22-7b93-47ed-b19f-b5004f4f1b4a.png)

## Lodestar
Lodestar is an open-sourced TypeScript implementation of the Ethereum Consensus (formerly known as eth2) specification maintained by ChainSafe Systems. Our goal is to develop, improve and diversify the Ethereum proof of stake ecosystem with our beacon chain and validator client with a focus on light client implementations. 

## Language information
Lodestar is built using TypeScript under a GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0.

## Become a validator with Lodestar
[Lodestar Installation Documentation](https://chainsafe.github.io/lodestar/installation/)

## Key Management
[Lodestar Key Management Documentation](https://chainsafe.github.io/lodestar/usage/key-management/)

## Troubleshooting
For support, contact our team on the [ChainSafe Discord](https://discord.gg/yjyvFRP) or open an issue on our [Lodestar monorepo](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/new/choose).

## Documentation
[Lodestar Documentation](https://chainsafe.github.io/lodestar/)
